story.paragraph1: Founded in 2024, Lingano emerged from a simple observation: traditional language learning methods weren't keeping pace with how people actually learn and communicate in the digital age.
story.paragraph2: Our team of linguists, educators, and technologists came together with a shared vision to create a platform that adapts to each learner's unique style, pace, and goals.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about Lingano.

pricing.question: How does pricing work?
pricing.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans to suit different learning needs. You can choose between monthly and yearly subscriptions, with discounts available for annual plans.

languages.question: What languages do you support?
languages.answer: Lingano currently supports over 25 languages including Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, and many more. We're constantly adding new languages based on user demand.

support.question: What kind of support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide comprehensive support including 24/7 email support, live chat during business hours, extensive documentation, video tutorials, and access to our community forum.

map.title: Find Us
map.description: Visit our office in the heart of Geneva, Switzerland. We're always happy to meet with our users and partners.
